Medellin homicides

medellin_homicides.Rd

Dataset of homicides in Medellin, Colombia, from 2010 to 2019.

Usage

medellin_homicides

Format

A data frame of 9,360 rows and 6 columns:

fecha_hecho

Date-time of the incident

longitud

Longitude

latitud

Latitude

sexo

Sex of victim

edad

Age of victim in years

modalidad

Method of homicide

This dataset is also available as a stand-alone file in CSV format at https://mpjashby.github.io/crimemappingdata/medellin_homicides.csv. Note that the CSV file uses semi colons as column delimiters and commas as decimal separators in numbers. This file can be read with functions such as readr::read_csv2().
